mapper.select: select b.business_no as business_no ,b.business_name as business_name , u.name as user_name from projectdb.business b, projectdb.user_info u where b.business_user_id= u.user_id Limit 2;

select MEMBER_SEQ , MEMBER_ID , PASSWORD , CRYPT_PASSWORD , MEMBER.NAME , EMAIL , CELLPHONE , MEMBER.ORGANIZATION_SEQ , REGISTER_SEQ , REGISTRY_DATE , MODIFIER_SEQ , MODIFY_DATE , ORGANIZATION.NAME ORGANIZATION_NAME from CIP_MEMBER MEMBER , CIP_ORGANIZATION ORGANIZATION
and MEMBER.ORGANIZATION_SEQ = ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_SEQ and MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projectdb.business ( business_no , business_name , business_user_id ) values( (select max(business_no)+1 from ( select business_no from `projectdb`.`business`) as business_no) , #{business_name} , uuid() )
